title: Marine mammal bycatch
text: This project is supported by the Ocean Modeling Forum and the Lenfest Ocean Program. The goal of the project was to provide a toolbox of tools helpful for stakeholders with data-poor marine mammal stocks. My primary contribution to this was the mmrefpoints R package and Shiny app.

title: Current projects
text: Projects listed here include both NOAA-related research projects and ongoing academic research projects.

title: Margaret Siple’s quarto page
text: Welcome to my Quarto webpage! I am working on filling it out. The page is public. The source code for this website is here.

title: Margaret Siple’s quarto page
text:
Marine mammal bycatch impacts
The marine mammal bycatch working group is a collaboration between academics and scientists from inside and outside NOAA, supported by The Ocean Modeling Forum. My primary contribution to this project was the mmrefpoints R package and Shiny app.

title: Margaret Siple’s quarto page
text:
Shiny tutorials
I have several Shiny tutorials, hosted in various places.

I learned how to use Quarto from Openscapes and R-Ladies Santa Barbara.

title: About
text: This site is intended to be a roadmap to my projects, including teaching and some NOAA-related side projects.
